Note:
Buttons (8-bit)
Bit0=LP
Bit1=MP
Bit2=HP
Bit4=LK
Bit5=MK
Bit6=HK
デモサウンド Demo Sound (8-bit)
コインシューター Coin Shooter (8-bit)

Controls - BitFlags
Bit0=P1 active
Bit1=P2 active

Match Number (8-bit)
It changes defeating an opponent

P1 - Sprites (8-bit)

[Demitri]
0x41 ... 0x44 = Midnight Bliss
0x3f, 0x40 = Demon Blast
0x44 ... 0x48 = Midnight Pleasure
0x3a (in) 0x3b (out) = Koumori Shoukan: Darkside Master

[Gallon]
0x61 ... 0x63 = Moment Slice
0x40, 0x41 = Dragon Cannon
0x42 = Zanzou Kougeki: Mirage Body

[Victor]
0x97 ... 0x9b = Great Geldenheim
0x95, 0x95 = Thunder Break
0xc2 ... 0xc6 = Geldenheim 3

[Zabel]
0x09 ... 0x0b = Evil Scream
0x12, 0x13 = Death Voltage
0x1b ... 0x1e = Hell Dunk
0x61 ... 0x6f = Saishuu Keitai: Ultimate Undead
0x23 ... 0x26 = Ultimate Revenge

[Morrigan]
0x7b ... 0x86= Darkness Illusion
0x69, 0x6a = Valkyrie Turn
0x8f, 0x90 = Bunshin Kougeki: Astral Vision
0x87 = Finishing Shower
0x89 = Cryptic Needle

[Anakaris]
0x9b ... 0xa5 = Shinjitsu no Oshie
0xb0 ... 0xb3 = Naraku no Ana
0xa6 ... 0xaf = Bunri Kougeki: Pharaoh Split
0x8b, 0x8c = Hitsugi no Mai
0xb4 ... 0xb7 = Pharaoh Magic (1 special)
0xb4 ... 0xb7 = Yajuu Mahou: Pharaoh Salvation (2 specials)
0xb4... 0xb7 = Bijo Mahou: Pharaoh Decoration (3 specials)

[Felicia]
0x0a ... 0x0f = Dancing Flash
0x16, 0x17 = Please Help Me!
0xbc, 0xbd = Cat Helper: Kitty's Helper

[Bishamon]
0x39, 0x3a = Oni Kubi Hineri
0x42, 0x43 = Enma Ishi
0x3b ... 0x40 = Togakubi Sarashi

[Aulbath]
0x72 = Aqua Spread
0x97 = Sea Rage
0x95 = Water Jail
0x58 Direct Scissors

[Sasquatch]
0xcd = Big Freeze
0xd6 ... 0xd9 = Big Ice Burn
0x86 ... 0x89 = Big Sledge
0x89 -> 0x8a = Big Trap
0x77 -> 0x78 = Big Resistor with MAPS

[Lei-Lei]
0xae = Tenrai Ha
0xab, 0xac = Chireitou
0x9e -> 0x9f = Chuukadan

[Phobos]
0xa2 -> 0xa3 = Erasing Sphere
0x82 ... 0x86 = Final Guardian β
0x76 ... 0x79 = Ray of Doom

[Pyron]
0x91 -> 0x92 = Cosmo Disruption
0x5b ... 0x5f = Piled Hell
0x1f = Shining Gemini

[Donovan]
0x12, 0x13 = Press of Death
0x15 ... 0x17 = Change Immortal
0x2a = Slay Shred

[Oboro Bishamon]
0x39, 0x3a = Oni Kubi Hineri
0x42, 0x43 = Enma Ishi
0x3b ... 0x40 = Togakubi Sarashi
0x4d, 0x4e = Kimen Kudaki

0x01=Demitri
0x02=Gallon
0x03=Victor
0x04=Zabel
0x05=Morrigan
0x06=Anakaris
0x07=Felicia
0x08=Bishamon
0x09=Rulbath

0x0d=Lei-Lei
0x0e=Lilith
0x0f=Jedah (Removed)
0x10=Phobos
0x11=Pyron
0x12=Gallon (Glitched)
0x13=Donovan
0x18=Oboro Bishamon (Secret Boss)
0x19=Oboro Bishamon

P2 - Round (8-bit)
0x01=0 Rounds won
0x00=1 Round won
0xFF=2 Rounds won

P1 - Round (8-bit)
0x01=0 Rounds won
0x00=1 Round won
0xFF=2 Rounds won
